biography_text: WESTERMAN, Bruce Eugene, a Representative from Arkansas; born in Hot Springs, Hot Springs County, Ark., November 18, 1967; graduated from Fountain Lake High School, Hot Springs, Ark., 1986; B.S., University of Arkansas, Fayetteville, Ark., 1990; M.F., Yale Forestry School, New Haven, Conn., 2001; engineer; member of the Fountain Lake, Ark., school board, 2006-2010; member of the Arkansas state house of representatives 2010-2014; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2015-present).
place_of_birth: Hot Springs, Hot Springs County, Ark.
